title: Louis Clark & The Royal Philharmonic Orchestra - Hooked On Class
description:
Hooked on Classics was a series of record albums first introduced in 1981, toward the end of the disco era&#039;s peak in popularity.

Louis Clark, former arranger for Electric Light Orchestra, conducted the Royal Philharmonic Orchestra playing a collection of very recognizable extracts from classical music pieces played over a continuous beat (sometimes an overtly disco fast beat, sometimes a slower and more subtle rhythm) which linked the segments together.

This is the compilation album of Hooked On The Classics

Track listing

1. Symphony Of The Seas

2. Hooked On Mendelssohn

3. Hooked On Classics (pts 1-2)

4. Dance Of The Furies

5. Hooked On Romance

6. Hooked On Rodgers And Hammerstein

7. Night At The Opera

8. Also Sprach Zarathustra

9. Hooked On Bach

10. Journey Through The Classics

11. Scotland The Brave

12. Tales Of The Vienna Woods

13. Can&#039;t Stop The Classics

14. Hooked On Romance (Part 2)

15. Hooked On Baroque

Enjoy The Classics!
